name: Kafka to BigQuery
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads JSON encoded messages from Apache Kafka and writes them into a BigQuery table.

parameters.name: inputTopic
parameters.label: Kafka input topic.
parameters.helpText: Apache Kafka topic to read from.

parameters.name: outputTable
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table to write to, in the form 'project:dataset.table' or 'dataset.table'.

parameters.name: bootstrapServer
parameters.label: Kafka bootstrap server
parameters.helpText: Apache Kafka bootstrap server in the form 'hostname:port'.
